name: Observer pattern C++
body: ### Observer Pattern C++ This project defines simple implementation of Observer Pattern which is one of the fundamendan programming patterns for messaging between objects. Project contains example on how to use the pattern and constructs entity2entity messaging without manager-entity in between. ### Authors and Contributors This project is maintained by Jukka Vatjus-Anttila (@Juginabi) so feel free to contact the awesome author by email if you have any questions. ### Donate Use [Pledge](https://pledgie.com/campaigns/30001) to donate if you like my code.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
